title: Saint Kitts and Nevis
officialName: Federation of Saint Christopher and Nevis
summary: Saint Kitts and Nevis is a country in Caribbean. The capital is Basseterre. Population: 51,320. Area: 261 kmÂ².

images.alt: The flag of Saint Kitts and Nevis features two large five-pointed white stars within a yellow-edged black diagonal band that extends from the lower hoist-side corner to the upper fly-side corner of the field. Above and beneath this band are a green and red triangle respectively.

attribution.note: National flags are in the public domain.
